job_description:
• Supporting technology deployment efforts which will require becoming acquainted with PMI, PTR, PRISM, PRD’s and TRD’s.

• Good communication, documentation, and interpersonal skills Good data summary and analysis skills Strong project management skills Less than 2 years Principal/Senior Engineer, Advanced Package Metrology-Real-Time Defect Analysis (MRDA)Singapore, SingaporePosted 4 months ago Wet Process Shift Lead EngineerBoise, Idaho, United States of America + 2 morePosted a month ago Senior Diffusion Process EngineerBoise, Idaho, United States of AmericaPosted 3 days ago.
